name: OAuth Integration
description: Implement OAuth2/OAuth3 authentication flows, token management, scopes, and consent flows.

name: Database Optimization
description: Optimize SQL queries, add indexes, tune database performance, analyze slow queries.

name: Video Compression
description: Compress, transcode, or process video files. Frame analysis, codec selection, bitrate tuning.

name: REST API Design
description: Design and implement REST APIs: endpoints, request/response schemas, versioning, error handling.

name: Docker Containerization
description: Build Docker images, write Dockerfiles, manage containers, docker-compose setup.

name: Security Audit
description: Audit code for security vulnerabilities: injection, XSS, CSRF, insecure dependencies, secrets exposure.

name: CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up or fix CI/CD pipelines: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, build automation, deployment workflows.

name: Machine Learning Model Training
description: Train, evaluate, and tune ML models. Handle datasets, loss functions, hyperparameters.

name: React Frontend Development
description: Build or fix React components, hooks, state management, routing, and UI patterns.

name: Python Performance Optimization
description: Profile and optimize Python code: algorithmic improvements, profiling, async patterns, memory usage.

name: Test Suite Development
description: Write unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Test coverage, mocking, fixtures.

name: Git Workflow
description: Manage git branches, commits, merges, rebases, and pull request workflows.

name: Bug Debugging
description: Debug crashes, errors, unexpected behavior. Stack trace analysis, reproduce minimum case.

name: Documentation Writing
description: Write technical documentation, READMEs, API docs, architecture diagrams, runbooks.

name: Code Refactoring
description: Refactor existing code: extract functions, reduce complexity, apply design patterns, clean up.

name: Dependency Management
description: Manage package dependencies: upgrade, audit vulnerabilities, pin versions, resolve conflicts.

name: Logging and Monitoring
description: Set up structured logging, monitoring dashboards, alerting, tracing, observability.

name: Data Pipeline
description: Build ETL/ELT pipelines, data transformation, batch processing, stream processing.

name: WebSocket / Real-time Communication
description: Build real-time features with WebSockets, SSE, long-polling, or message queues.

name: Encryption and Cryptography
description: Implement encryption, hashing, key management, certificates, TLS/SSL, signing.

name: Cache Optimization
description: Design and tune caching strategies: Redis, Memcached, CDN, HTTP caching, cache invalidation.

name: Infrastructure as Code
description: Define and manage infrastructure with Terraform, Pulumi, AWS CDK, Ansible, or similar.

name: File Storage and Upload
description: Implement file upload, storage, CDN integration, object storage (S3, GCS), presigned URLs.

name: Rate Limiting
description: Implement API rate limiting, throttling, token bucket, sliding window, backoff strategies.

name: Search and Indexing
description: Build full-text search, semantic search, index management, ranking, query optimization.
